commit_message: Replace the old PlotArea usage with a new PlotTableArea component and update App to render it. PlotTableArea is a refactor that removes inline Plotly rendering and heavy plot-generation logic; instead it composes smaller subcomponents (TableArea and a child PlotArea) and manages a local viewMode ('plot' | 'table'). Kept ResizeObserver logic to update chart dimensions via the ink ratio store. Removed direct usages of many stores, Plotly helpers, settings/debug popup handlers, and trace/stat side-effects from this file — those responsibilities should now live in the child components or stores. This change splits concerns and simplifies the top-level plot/table area, but note that some side-effects (stats/traces/popups) were removed here and may require wiring elsewhere.
